long_description: The ProRack Cargo Box 10 roof box adds valuable gear-stashing space to your car, freeing up the seats for a carload of friends when you head out on an adventure. U-bolt attachment hardware fits most factory and after-market racks. ProRack Cargo Box 10 opens on 1 side only; includes lock and key.
short_description: The ProRack Cargo Box 10 roof box adds valuable gear-stashing space to your car, freeing up the seats for a carload of friends when you head out on an adventure.
